text:
there’s a resize_image_url function <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/cms/hubl/functions#resize_image_url>

This gives you some params to play with, I usually use the length param 0, 0, 600 set the max size of the longest dimension to 600px for example

There is a certain size that HubSpot stops auto resizing too, I think 4096 or bigger, so images should at least be smaller than that (in both dimensions) to resize
Hi Everyone, Can somebody help me with this integration. Trying to add 2 fields (email, toll_free_number), however this are showing in the editor layout but not rendering in the website header.
Hi <@U07BC7P90KW> is the group "list items" a repeater?

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!

HI Everyone, can someone point me to resources that help me understand how the javascript embed code works for forms? When I create the form using the HubSpot link, the style settings are preserved, but when I make the javascript embed code, it seems to change the style settings to what is native on our website (which is not what we want).

Hello everyone, I have been trying to verify my domain with HubSpot and Namecheap to pass the *verification process and publish my app. However I am getting that HubSpot cannot access the DNS records of my domain and therefore cannot verify my domain. I have tried changing the host name from www to @ but still not resolving the issue. The error log says that HubSpot is waiting on DNS changes. Any help or clue is going to be super appreciated*
